item.title: Exploring Ancient Thames Pier: Here's What I Found
item.description: Join a journey along an old Thames pier, uncovering artifacts, historical insights, and discoveries that reveal life and activity along the river centuries ago.

item.title: Pudding Lane token takes us back to the Great Fire of London.
item.description: This video explores a token found on Pudding Lane and its connection to the Great Fire of London, offering historical context and insight into daily life during the 17th century. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: Finding A Rolex Watch - Is It Real Or Not?
item.description: This video follows the discovery of a Rolex watch and examines the details used to determine whether it’s authentic or not, focusing on craftsmanship, markings, and expert checks.

item.title: Closing 2025 on the Thames As the Last Treasures Emerged
item.description: A reflective look at the final discoveries of 2025 along the Thames, highlighting notable finds, historical context, and what they reveal as the year comes to a close. A mudlarking permit from the Port of London Authority is required in order to mudlark on the River Thames

item.title: Finding Ship Remains Along The Foreshore
item.description: Exploring historical shipwreck remains uncovered along the foreshore, examining their history, significance, and what they reveal about maritime life.

item.title: The owner of this padlock lost his youngest son in World War One
item.description: The story behind a padlock whose owner lost his youngest son in World War One, exploring its historical significance and the personal memory it represents.
